member.summary: The value or content to display on the vertical axis.
member.remarks: This can be set to a formatted string, such as "{0:n}", or it can be set to a DataTemplate.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamSparkline.HorizontalAxisLabel
member.summary: The value or content to display on the horizontal axis.
member.remarks: This can be set to a formatted string, such as "{0}", or it can be set to a DataTemplate.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamSparklineView.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Provides the behavior for the Measure pass of Silverlight layout. Classes can override this method to define their own Measure pass behavior.
member.param: The available size that this object can give to child objects. Infinity () can be specified as a value to indicate that the object will size to whatever content is available.
member.returns: The size that this object determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of the allocated sizes for child objects; or based on other considerations, such as a fixed container size.
